name: tnextspc
story: The Next Space is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up released in 1989 by SNK for arcades. The game is a typical scrolling shooter, with two buttons used for the primary shot and secondary shot respectively. Red capsules leave "S" icons which raise the ship's speed. Along the way the player can also find blue capsules which release power-ups that equip different secondary shots into the ship.
